name: worm's day out
description:
You are a worm. You are alive and present in this little world, and you have no obligations. Simply explore wherever, whoever, whatever you find interesting.

A short open-world game made in Bitsy. This is my first project-- please share any critiques you have! I may or may not attempt to expand the game later on.

A cheat sheet is attached, intended for those who are A) stuck, or B) already done with the game and just want some behind-the-scenes info. Mostly I made it to keep track of everything during development.

Please note that this game contains profanity and is not aimed towards children.
